title: My Life in Advertising and Scientific Advertising
features: Gain a lifetime of experience from the inventor of test marketing and coupon sampling -- Claude C. Hopkins. Here, you'll get two landmark works in one, and discover his fixed principles and basic fundamentals that still prevail today.
description: This volume contains his two landmark books. Scientific Advertising--the classic primer still read by today's top copywriters--was originally written in 1923. Four years later, he finished his autobiography, My Life in Advertising.
McGraw-Hill authors represent the leading experts in their fields and are dedicated to improving the lives, careers, and interests of readers worldwide
